tweet: Half way and still holding off 7th place guy on old tires.  Not easy but doing it.  Colin has not said a word last 30 laps.
Jack Roush just showed up and got on the pit box.
P6 now.  Looks like 7th can't get him so that Mike Beam call gained them 4 spots if Colin can hold on.  Said tighter but change helped
Guys with new tires getting him but all about track position later in the race.
